admission_details.admission_process: Prospective students need to submit an online application form before the application deadline. Along with the application, they must provide SAT and TOEFL scores for international applicants. Shortlisted candidates will be invited for an interview. The final admission decision will be based on academic records, test scores, and interview performance.
admission_details.scholarship_details: Academic Heights University offers various scholarships based on academic merit, extracurricular achievements, and financial need. Students can apply for scholarships through a separate scholarship application after receiving the admission offer.
